law.catch_line: Storage, transportation of flammable liquids in motor vehicles prohibited; exceptions.

text.section:
Sec. 30-369.1. Storage, transportation of flammable liquids in motor vehicles prohibited; exceptions.
It is a violation of this chapter for flammable liquid to be stored within or transported by motor vehicle except:
Pursuant to Section 30-369 of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida; or
In the fuel tank of a motor vehicle; or
In a container which meets or exceeds the standards delineated in Section 16.63(5) of the Miami-Dade County, Florida, Fire Prevention and Safety Code.
